citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:20 PM on
06-Mar-19.
Spoke with the licensee via cell phone. The licensee was out of town.

narrative:
